channel.title: Dances With Wolves on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mary McDonnell Joins Marvel’s ‘Vision’ Series and Thriller Film ‘One Second After’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The two-time Academy Award nominee is set to star opposite Josh Holloway and Hannah John-Kamen in the movie adapting the 2009 novel.

item.title: Mary McDonnell Joins Marvel’s ‘Vision’ Series and Thriller Film ‘One Second After’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The two-time Academy Award nominee is set to star opposite Josh Holloway and Hannah John-Kamen in the movie adapting the 2009 novel.

item.title: Graham Greene, ‘Dances With Wolves’ Actor, Dies at 73
item.description: The actor’s role as Kicking Bird in the 1990 film ‘Dances with Wolves’ earned him a best supporting actor Oscar nomination.
